document_data.name: Pelandro's Peerless Shipyards
document_data.mainbody: '''Pelandro's Peerless Shipyards''' was a shipbuilder based out of [[Teziir]] on the [[Dragon Coast]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The shipyards were run by [[Pelandro Rahavillar]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR and specialized in the construction of large unarmed old-design battle [[caravel]]s that lacked battling rams. Pelandro's was known for its low prices, and the vessels produced by Pelandro Rahavillar could be used as both warships and merchant's vessels.
